nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.settings

Interface SettingsHandler<T,L extends SettingsChangeListener>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccessSettingsHandler, AlertSettingsHandler, BaseSettingsHandler, LocalSettingsHandler, LogSettingsHandler, MailSettingsHandler, MailTranslationHandler, MessageSettingsHandler

    public interface SettingsHandler<T,L extends SettingsChangeListener>
    Handles details for an specific settings type
    Author:
    luis
